name: The Wakefields of Sweet Valley Online Quiz | Literature | 15 Questions

questions.text: Who did Alice Larson first love?
questions.explanation:
Theodore Wakefield.

	Alice's parents died so she sailed to America to be with her uncle. On the voyage, she met Theo Wakefield who saved her from drowning. After the voyage, they never saw each other again.

George Johnson.

	Alice gave birth to the first generation of twins.

questions.text: What were the names of the twins Alice Larson had?
questions.explanation:
Jessamyn and Elisabeth.

	Elisabeth resembles Elizabeth and Jessamyn is like Jessica.

questions.text: Which country did Alice Larson come from?
questions.explanation:
Sweden.

	After her parent's death she sailed to America.

no.

	Elisabeth died in a horse-riding accident.

Taylor Watson.

	Jessamyn was thinking of marrying a man called Bruce. There was a fire and Taylor risked his life to save another. On seeing this, Jessamyn married Taylor Watson, the man she truly loved.

questions.text: Who did Samantha think the best man in the world was?
questions.explanation:
Ted.

	Samantha loved Ted Wakefield, Theodore Wakefield's grandson. But Ted liked Amanda, Samantha's twin. Samantha got her revenge by putting Ted into jail and acting like she was Amanda.

Jack Lewis.

	Samantha died while giving birth to her child. Sam became an actress. Amanda hated Sam still about the Ted issue but when she heard her twin was dying she rushed to the hospital and they made up.

questions.text: What did Samantha name her child?
questions.explanation:
Marjorie.

	Marjorie was looked after her Aunt Amanda and her father Jack Lewis.

questions.text: Marjorie and her father were stuck in Austria during World War II because they were American.
questions.explanation:
false.

	They were stuck in France, not Austria.

questions.text: Where did Marjorie hide after her father was taken away?
questions.correct: in the cellar of a wine store
options: in the store room of a wine store
questions.explanation:
in the cellar of a wine store.

	She hid there with another girl whose brother, Jacques, was in the Resistance, a group who helped the Jews.

questions.text: What is the name of the girl who hid the cellar with Marjorie?
questions.explanation:
Sophie.

	Sophie's older brother and Marjorie fell in love but Jacques died, sadly.

questions.text: What are the names of the children Marjorie had?
questions.explanation:
Nancy, Alice, Laura.

	Nancy's children are Robin and Stacey and Laura had a child called Kelly.

Ned Wakefield.

	She was engaged to Hank Patman - Bruce's father! But at the wedding, she ran to Ned's dorm and they got married.

questions.text: Who are the people in the Wakefield family?
questions.explanation:
Ned, Alice, Steven, Elizabeth, Jessica.

	Ned and Alice are the parents. Steven, named after Alice Larson's son is an annoying big brother. Then the third set of twins in generations, Elizabeth and Jessica.
